MAN.TITLE: mtlb_load
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: load variables from file with matlab4 format.

DESCRIPTION.P: mtlb_load load variables on file with matlab4 formats.
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_ITEM: loads in scilab all variables stored in file binary fname.mat .

loads in scilab variable stored in ascii file fname, which must contain a rectangular array of numeric data, arranged in m lines with n values in each line. The result is an m-by-n matrix named fname .
reads the ascii file xxx.yyy, which must contain a rectangular array of numeric data, arranged in m lines with n values in each line. The result is an m-by-n matrix named xxx.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: "stdio" value for fname doesnt redirect load from standard input.
